title: Treasure
occurrences: Yeah, right. What's the treasure, man? Is it valuable? What's it worth?
We're after some treasure. Just so we're clear.
Come on, Musa. Treasure hunting on the day of the funeral?
Treasure in the middle of nowhere?
The treasure is cursed. It has a dead guy with it.
- Just go on. - It's not a Muslim treasure.
Musa, just get the treasure.
- We'll lose the treasure too. - He's right.
That phone... It won't do much without the treasure, you know.
We didn't hunt for treasure tonight, and nobody saw Ilyas.
- You're still talking about the treasure? - We'll talk. Come on.
His client only cares about the treasure.
We just need to deliver the treasure. That's how we'll save our skin.
They'll just think we killed him for the treasure.
I swear they were after some treasure. Who would hunt in the middle of the night?
- Zehra! - They were treasure hunting.
She mentioned treasure. She said it was late.
Treasure, sir? Please, for God's sake.
because, I mean, I don't remember any treasure.
Forget the treasure, guys.
I thought the treasure was important to them.
I say we take the treasure from Salih.
We'll go grab the treasure tonight.
I'm getting the treasure.
What if they actually found some treasure and are fighting over it?
But Zehra said they were treasure hunting.
What treasure, for God's sake? Those guys are useless.
They can't organize a treasure hunt.
I don't even have the treasure. How would killing him benefit me?
how Saffet wanted to kill you and steal the treasure,
- What was he doing, then? - Digging up some treasure.
Ilyas is not missing. You went treasure hunting together.
There's no treasure!
He said you'd find treasure and we'd be well off.
You guys took the treasure and killed my husband, right?
Didn't you go treasure hunting?
One of the alleged treasure hunters who were there that night was Saffet.
Maybe they had a fight over the treasure.
Musa took me with them to look for the treasure.
Look what we've been through because of the treasure.
- The treasure? - Zehra, give him the phone.
